name: css-background-size
description: Css module of single purpose classes for background size

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-background-size.css > css/css-background-size.css && tachyons src/css-background-size.css --minify > css/css-background-size.min.css && tachyons src/css-background-size.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
